data.title: Jimi Hendrix Black Legacy series Part 8-Sheldon Reynolds
data.meta_description: Part 8 of the Jimi Hendrix series welcomes Grammy nominated, acclaimed and accomplished singer, songwriter, and guitarist Sheldon Reynolds. Sheldon has worked with such greats as Millie Jackson, Sun, The Commodores, and most notably Earth, Wind, and Fire. Sheldon also formed a group called Devoted Spirits with fellow EWF alumni Larry Dunn and Morris Pleasure. Sheldon's voice can also be heard on movie soundtracks (Glory), commercials, and such hit TV shows as Who's the Boss. Of particular interest to our listeners, is Sheldon's work with Experience Hendrix, including a few Jimi Hendrix tribute projects. Tune in on Monday at 6:30 PM EST (3:30 PM PST) to hear what else Sheldon has going on. Click here to visit Sheldon's site. Sheldon's myspace page
data.text:
Part 8 of the Jimi Hendrix series welcomes Grammy nominated, acclaimed and accomplished singer, songwriter, and guitarist Sheldon Reynolds. Sheldon has worked with such greats as Millie Jackson, Sun, The Commodores, and most notably Earth, Wind, and Fire. Sheldon also formed a group called Devoted Spirits with fellow EWF alumni Larry Dunn and Morris Pleasure. Sheldon's voice can also be heard on movie soundtracks (Glory), commercials, and such hit TV shows as Who's the Boss. Of particular interest to our listeners, is Sheldon's work with Experience Hendrix, including a few Jimi Hendrix tribute projects. Tune in on Monday at 6:30 PM EST (3:30 PM PST) to hear what else Sheldon has going on.

Click here to visit Sheldon's site.
